scripts.ignition-math: curl -sL AchmadFathoni:$GITHUB_TOKEN https://api.github.com/repos/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/tags | grep name | grep -v pre -m1 | cut -d'"' -f4 | cut -d'_' -f2
scripts.ros-noetic-mavlink: curl -sL AchmadFathoni:$GITHUB_TOKEN https://api.github.com/repos/mavlink/mavlink-gbp-release/tags | grep -m1 name | cut -d'"' -f4 | cut -d'/' -f2
scripts.ros-noetic-mavros: curl -sL AchmadFathoni:$GITHUB_TOKEN https://api.github.com/repos/mavlink/mavros-release/tags | grep -m1 upstream/1 | cut -d'"' -f4 | cut -d'/' -f2
scripts.ros-noetic-mavros-msgs: curl -sL AchmadFathoni:$GITHUB_TOKEN https://api.github.com/repos/mavlink/mavros-release/tags | grep -m1 upstream/1 | cut -d'"' -f4 | cut -d'/' -f2
scripts.ros-noetic-libmavconn: curl -sL AchmadFathoni:$GITHUB_TOKEN https://api.github.com/repos/mavlink/mavros-release/tags | grep -m1 upstream/1 | cut -d'"' -f4 | cut -d'/' -f2
scripts.ros-noetic-mavros-extras: curl -sL AchmadFathoni:$GITHUB_TOKEN https://api.github.com/repos/mavlink/mavros-release/tags | grep -m1 upstream/1 | cut -d'"' -f4 | cut -d'/' -f2
scripts.rtklib: curl -sL AchmadFathoni:$GITHUB_TOKEN https://api.github.com/repos/tomojitakasu/RTKLIB/releases/latest | grep tag_name | cut -d'"' -f4 | tr -d 'v-'
